title: oc6 - files trashbin app - available file/folder action not shown on same row
body:
## expected behavior

in the file app all available file/folder actions are usually shown on the same row. i would expect to see the `restore` and `delete` action behind deleted files/folders too.

## actual behavior

the available files/folders actions are not shown on the same row in the list of deleted files/folders. in oc 5.0.13 these actions are still displayed.

![20131213_oc6_file_trashbin_action_not_displayed](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1742709/89dae54e-6400-11e3-9fef-bacf685bef88.png)

## steps to reproduce

1.) click on `deleted files` in the file app and check the available actions behind each entry.

## environment:

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache2 2.4.6
database: mysql 5.1.72
php version: 5.4.21
owncloud version: 6.0


#### client configuration

browser: firefox 26.0
operating system: windows 7
